rules: Rule1: If person1 is vaccinated, then simulation game1 is active.
Rule2: Either person1 follows the protocol, or simulation game1 is active.
Rule3: Provided that person1 wears a mask, it is not the case that person1 follows the protocol.
Rule4: Under the condition that person1 completes training, if person1 washes hands, then either person1 social distances or person1 wears a mask.
Rule5: Either person1 receives a certificate, or in the event that person1 does not complete training, person1 does not pass the test.
Rule6: Either person1 uses vehicle1, or if person1 is not vaccinated, then person1 is not infected.
Rule7: Whenever person1 reaches location1, person1 travels to location1.
Rule8: Under the condition that person1 can access vehicle1, if person1 uses vehicle1, then person1 reaches location1.
Rule9: Provided that person1 is cured, person1 has immunity.
Rule10: If person1 is cured, then it is not the case that person1 has immunity.
Rule11: Either person1 is cured, or if disease1 is contagious, then disease1 spreads.
Rule12: In the event that person1 is not vaccinated, person1 is infected.
Rule13: Provided that person1 does not complete training, person1 passes the test.
Rule14: Under the condition that simulation game1 is not active, disease1 is contagious.
facts: Fact3: Person1 does not social distance.
Fact4: Person1 does not receive a certificate.
Fact5: Person1 does not travel to location1.
